languages.text: "Вспоминай свет Астрономикона, Кассия. Вспоминай Его вечное святое сияние. Пускай память о нем поможет тебе проложить наш путь на свободу!"
"Remember the light of the Astronomican, Cassia. Remember His eternal holy radiance. May the memory of it help you plot our course to freedom!"
languages.original_text: "Вспоминай свет Астрономикона, Кассия. Вспоминай Его вечное святое сияние. Пускай память о нем поможет тебе проложить наш путь на свободу!"

traits.locale_text: "Remember the light of the Astronomican, Cassia, Remember His eternal holy radiance. May the memory of it help you plot our course to freedom!"
"Remember the light of the Astronomican, Cassia, Remember His eternal holy radiance. May the memory of it help you plot our course to freedom!"
"Remember the light of the Astronomican, Cassia, Remember His eternal holy radiance. May the memory of it help you plot our course to freedom!"
"Remember the light of the Astronomican, Cassia, Remember His eternal holy radiance. May the memory of it help you plot our course to freedom!"

languages.text: “回想星炬的光辉，卡西娅！回想神皇永恒的圣光！愿圣光的记忆帮助你为我们绘制出通往自由的航路！”
languages.original_text: "Remember the light of the Astronomican, Cassia. Remember His eternal holy radiance. May the memory of it help you plot our course to freedom!"

traits.locale_text: “回想星炬的光辉，卡西娅！回想神皇永恒的圣光！愿圣光的记忆帮助你为我们绘制出通往自由的航路！”
“回想星炬的光辉，卡西娅！回想神皇永恒的圣光！愿圣光的记忆帮助你为我们绘制出通往自由的航路！”

languages.text: « Pensez à la lumière de l'Astronomican, Cassia. Pensez à Son rayonnement sacré. Que son souvenir vous aide à retrouver le chemin de la liberté ! »
languages.original_text: "Remember the light of the Astronomican, Cassia. Remember His eternal holy radiance. May the memory of it help you plot our course to freedom!"

traits.locale_text: « Pensez à la lumière de l'Astronomican, Cassia. Pensez à Son rayonnement sacré. Que son souvenir vous aide à retrouver le chemin de la liberté ! »

languages.text: «Recuerde la luz del Astronomicón, Cassia. Recuerde su eterno resplandor sagrado. ¡Y que ese recuerdo la ayude a trazar nuestro rumbo hacia la libertad!».
languages.original_text: "Remember the light of the Astronomican, Cassia. Remember His eternal holy radiance. May the memory of it help you plot our course to freedom!"

traits.locale_text: «Recuerde la luz del Astronomicón, Cassia. Recuerde su eterno resplandor sagrado. ¡Y que ese recuerdo la ayude a trazar nuestro rumbo hacia la libertad!».

languages.text: 「星辰波の光を思い出せ、カシア。皇帝の神聖なる輝きは永遠だ。その記憶で我らが自由への航路を描こう！」
languages.original_text: "Remember the light of the Astronomican, Cassia. Remember His eternal holy radiance. May the memory of it help you plot our course to freedom!"

traits.locale_text: 「星辰波の光を思い出せ、カシア。皇帝の神聖なる輝きは永遠だ。その記憶で我らが自由への航路を描こう！」
「星辰波の光を思い出せ、カシア。皇帝の神聖なる輝きは永遠だ。その記憶で我らが自由への航路を描こう！」

languages.text: "Denkt an das Licht des Astronomican, Cassia. Denkt an seinen ewigen heiligen Glanz. Möge die Erinnerung daran Euch helfen, unseren Weg in die Freiheit zu finden!"
languages.original_text: "Remember the light of the Astronomican, Cassia. Remember His eternal holy radiance. May the memory of it help you plot our course to freedom!"

traits.locale_text: "Denkt an das Licht des Astronomican, Cassia. Denkt an seinen ewigen heiligen Glanz. Möge die Erinnerung daran Euch helfen, unseren Weg in die Freiheit zu finden!"

languages.original_text: "Remember the light of the Astronomican, Cassia, Remember His eternal holy radiance. May the memory of it help you plot our course to freedom!"

languages.text: "Astronomikan'ın ışığını aklına getir Cassia. O'nun ebedî kutsal aydınlığını aklına getir. Bu hatıralar, özgürlüğe çıkan yolu planlamanda yardımcın olsun!"
languages.original_text: "Remember the light of the Astronomican, Cassia. Remember His eternal holy radiance. May the memory of it help you plot our course to freedom!"

traits.locale_text: "Astronomikan'ın ışığını hatırla Cassia. O'nun ebedî kutsal aydınlığını hatırla. Bu hatıralar, özgürlüğe çıkan yolu planlarken sana yardım etsin!"
